backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (UserProfile, Project, Contractor, Bill, NMR, Payment) and in-memory storage maps with CRUD operations, role-based access control mixins, and auto-incrementing ID generators.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, pages, hooks, and utilities describing authentication, CRUD operations, role-based access, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar, chart, and semantic color definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the PayGo application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (dashboard, users, projects, contractors, bills, NMR, payments, analytics), QueryClient provider, theme provider, and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/AppShel: Fixed layout wrapper component with sidebar and scrollable main content area, supporting optional banner slot for status messages.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/RoleBad: Badge component displaying user roles (Admin, Site Engineer, Project Manager, QC, Billing Engineer, Viewer) with role-specific styling variants.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/Sidebar: Fixed left navigation sidebar with logo, role-based menu items, active route highlighting, user profile footer (name, email, role badge), and logout button shown only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CurrentInternetI: Fixed bottom-right panel displaying current Internet Identity principal with copy-to-clipboard functionality for debugging authentication state.
frontend/src/components/dialogs/DeleteWi: An alert dialog component that requires password confirmation before performing a delete action, with customizable title and description.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorBounda: React error boundary class component catching fatal errors and rendering FatalErrorFallback with error details and reload option.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Error fallback UI displaying error message in a card with reload button when fatal errors are caught by error boundary.
Blue alert banner prompting unauthenticated users to sign in for full feature access, displayed at top of pages in guest mode.
frontend/src/components/ProfileStatusBan: A reusable banner component that displays loading, error, or info states with appropriate icons, styling, and optional retry/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication state with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, projects, contractors, bills, NMRs, and payments, with detailed logging for debugging authentication flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components and setting Century Gothic as the primary font.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Utility functions for date manipulation: adding days to a date string and formatting dates in Indian locale format.
frontend/src/lib/formatters/currency.ts: Formats numbers as Indian Rupee currency strings using Intl.NumberFormat with appropriate locale and currency settings.
frontend/src/lib/roleAccess.ts: Defines role-based access control functions and utilities for checking permissions (admin, billing, approvals, etc.) and converting between role types and strings.
frontend/src/lib/units.ts: Defines a constant array of measurement units (Rft, Sft, Kg, etc.) and exports a TypeScript type for unit values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/analytics/AnalyticsPa: Placeholder page for analytics features with a card indicating that trade-wise totals, top 3 summaries, and advanced filtering will be available in the future.
Dialog form for creating new bills with fields for project, contractor, date, trade, unit, price, quantity, description, and location; auto-populates trade from selected contractor.
frontend/src/pages/bills/BillsPage.tsx: Main bills listing page with table view, role-based access controls for raising and deleting bills, status badges, and actions to view or delete bills with password confirmation.
Read-only dialog displaying complete bill details including bill number, status badge, contractor/project info, pricing details, and approval workflow information.
frontend/src/pages/contractors/Contracto: Dialog form for creating and editing contractors with fields for date, project, name, trade, unit, pricing, estimated quantity, and contact details; calculates estimated amount automatically.
Main contractors page with filtering, table view, and CRUD operations (view, edit, delete with password confirmation) based on user role permissions.
A dialog component that displays detailed read-only information about a contractor, including ID, name, project, trade, pricing, contact details, and attachments.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Dashboard page displaying statistics cards for total bills, completed/pending payments, and total paid amount, with authentication check before showing data.
frontend/src/pages/Deactivated.tsx: Displays a deactivated account page with an error message and logout button that clears authentication and query cache.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page component that displays the PayGo logo and a login button to authenticate via Internet Identity, with optional cancel functionality.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRFormDialog.tsx: Dialog form for creating new NMR (weekly records) with project/contractor selection and dynamic entry rows for labor details with automatic amount calculation.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRPage.tsx: Main NMR page listing weekly records in a table with status badges, view/delete actions, and role-based permissions for creating and deleting NMRs.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRViewDialog.tsx: Dialog component displaying detailed NMR information including project details, contractor, week period, status badge, and a table of labor entries with calculated amounts.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFormD: Dialog component for creating new payments, allowing users to select an approved bill, enter payment date and amount, and displays calculated balance with validation.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentsPage: Main payments page displaying a table of all payments with sorting, status badges, and actions for viewing and deleting payments (with role-based access control).
frontend/src/pages/ProfileLoadError.tsx: Displays an error page when a user profile cannot be loaded, offering a logout button and explaining possible causes (account not created, missing permissions, or system initializing).
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Handles initial profile setup for new users, allowing the bootstrap admin to self-register and pre-created users to complete their setup via the completePendingUserSetup mutation.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectFormD: Dialog component for creating and editing projects with fields for project details, client info, budget, addresses, location links, and status selection.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectsPage: Main projects page with filterable table (by status and search), role-based CRUD actions, and integration with project form, view, and delete dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectViewD: Read-only dialog component that displays complete project information including ID, status, client details, budget, addresses, and location links in a formatted layout.
Dialog component for creating new users (with name, email, mobile, role) or editing existing users (role and active status only). Uses mutations to create/update users and displays validation errors via toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/users/UsersPage.tsx: Main users management page that displays a table of all users with view/edit/delete actions, refresh functionality, and integrates UserFormDialog, UserViewDialog, and DeleteWithPasswordDialog. Includes logging to track user list display and prevents deletion of main admin.
Read-only dialog component that displays detailed user information including PayGo ID, name, email, mobile, role badge, active status badge, and principal ID in a formatted layout.
frontend/src/routes/RootLayout.tsx: Root layout component that handles authentication flow, profile loading with timeout protection, and conditionally renders LoginPage, ProfileSetup, DeactivatedPage, or the main AppShell with banners based on user authentication and profile status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to store, retrieve, and clear parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme including sidebar colors, custom animations (accordion), container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating pending feature requests to display full users list with auto-generated unique IDs, restore Version 12 configuration, and implement automatic unique identity generation for each user.
